servinfosub.title: Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt
servinfosub.ptxt: Replace belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine) or Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine) .

servinfosub.title: Power Steering Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt (M16 Engine)
servinfosub.ptxt: Replace belt and then adjust belt tension referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
